00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00031 #include "_ht32_project_source.h"
00032 #include "lcd_ESK32_A3A31.h"
00033 
00034 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00035   * @{
00036   */
00037 
00038 /** @addtogroup Mono_LCD_Examples Mono_LCD
00039   * @{
00040   */
00041 
00042 /** @addtogroup LCD_module
00043   * @{
00044   */
00045 
00046 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 vu32 isUpdateDisplayFinish;
00048 
00049 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00051   * @brief  Main program.
00052   * @retval None
00053   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00054 int main(void)
00055 {
00056   int x,y; 
00057   LCD_Init_ESK32_A3A31();
00058   while(1)
00059   {
00060     /* Show a volume picture.                                                                               */
00061     LCD_show_VoiceConfig(LCD_VOICE_LEVEL_5);
00062 
00063     /* Show a Bluetooth picture.                                                                            */
00064     LCD_show_BT(LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00065     LCD_show_BT_UpStream(LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00066     LCD_show_BT_DownStream(LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00067 
00068     /* Show a Holtek logo picture.                                                                          */
00069     LCD_show_HoltekLogo(LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00070 
00071     /* Show a RF picture.                                                                                   */
00072     LCD_show_RF_Level(LCD_RF_LEVEL_3);
00073     LCD_show_RF_UpStream(LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00074     LCD_show_RF_DownStream(LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00075 
00076     /* Show a battery picture.                                                                              */
00077     LCD_show_BAT_Frame(LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00078     LCD_show_BAT_Level(LCD_BAT_LEVEL_3);
00079 
00080     /* Show the first 7-segment Display                                                                     */
00081     LCD_show_Group1_number(LCD_DIGIT_0, _7SEG_8);
00082     LCD_show_Group1_number(LCD_DIGIT_1, _7SEG_8);
00083     LCD_show_Group1_number(LCD_DIGIT_2, _7SEG_8);
00084     LCD_show_Group1_number(LCD_DIGIT_3, _7SEG_8);
00085     LCD_show_Group1_Dot(LCD_DIGIT_0);
00086     LCD_show_Group1_Unit(LCD_UNIT_AM);
00087 
00088     /* Show the second 7-segment Display                                                                    */
00089     LCD_show_Group2_number(LCD_DIGIT_NONE, _7SEG_Minus);
00090     LCD_show_Group2_number(LCD_DIGIT_0, _7SEG_8);
00091     LCD_show_Group2_number(LCD_DIGIT_1, _7SEG_8);
00092     LCD_show_Group2_number(LCD_DIGIT_2, _7SEG_8);
00093     LCD_show_Group2_number(LCD_DIGIT_3, _7SEG_8);
00094     LCD_show_Group2_number(LCD_DIGIT_4, _7SEG_8);
00095     LCD_show_Group2_Dot(LCD_DIGIT_0);
00096     LCD_show_Group2_Unit(LCD_UNIT_mV);
00097 
00098     while(1)
00099     {
00100       for(y=0;y<8;y++)
00101       {
00102         for(x=0;x<20;x++)
00103         {
00104           LCD_show_Matrix(x, y, LCD_PIXEL_ON);
00105           /* Send upadate display request.                                                                  */
00106           LCD_SetUpdateDisplayRequest();
00107 
00108           /* Waiting for the update to finish.                                                              */
00109           isUpdateDisplayFinish = FALSE;
00110           while(isUpdateDisplayFinish == FALSE){}
00111         }
00112       }
00113       /* Clear Matrix                                                                                       */
00114       LCD_MatrixClear(0, 0,20,8,LCD_PIXEL_OFF);
00115     }
00116   }
00117 }
00118 
00119 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00120 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00121   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00122   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00123   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00124   * @retval None
00125   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00126 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00127 {
00128   /*
00129      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00130      Debug message can be added here.
00131      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00132   */
00133 
00134   while (1)
00135   {
00136   }
00137 }
00138 #endif
